article.Heading: Inside Chhattisgarh: The rise of industrialisation
article.Summary: CNBC TV18's Archana Shukla finds out that the ghosts of land acquisition policy are still haunting the industrialisation milieu in the tribal, Naxal-hit districts in Bastar.
article.Body:
Tribal Chhattisgarh is seeing some industrialisation moves as NMDC's steel plant in Nagarnar is reaches its completion. The second project with Steel Authority of India Limited (SAIL) is expected to come up in Dilmili village. This project was announced by Prime Minister Narendra Modi and is one that claims to provide employment to 10,000 people and pave the way for development.

CNBC-TV18's Archana Shukla finds out that the ghosts of land acquisition policy are still haunting the industrialisation milieu in the tribal, Naxal-hit districts in Bastar. Here's the third part of Budget special edition of 'What's ailing rural India'.
